feature.label: Eclipse Checkstyle AST-Viewer Plugin
feature.description:
Eclipse Checkstyle AST-Viewer is a simple Eclipse plugin which adds "Open Checkstyle AST Tree" context menu action to all Java files in workspace.
See more at http://sevntu-checkstyle.github.io/checkstyle-ast-eclipse-viewer
